name: file cabinet
description: The file cabinet is a compact, sturdy piece of furniture with several drawers. It sits against one corner of the Archives Room, storing various files and documents in an organized manner. As you examine the files inside, you notice a particular folder with the CEO's [confidential information].
use: You can use the file cabinet to access files and documents stored within. Despite its size, it holds essential information that could be valuable to you.
throw: Throwing the file cabinet would be impractical and potentially damaging to the files and documents inside.
taste: Tasting the file cabinet is not advisable. It's made of wood and metal and is not meant to be consumed.
touch: As you touch the file cabinet's surface, you feel the smoothness of polished wood and the sturdiness of the metal handles.
smell: The file cabinet has a faint scent of aged wood and a hint of dust, typical of items stored in the Archives Room.
shake: Shaking the file cabinet won't achieve anything significant. It's a well-built piece of furniture.
break_item: Attempting to break the file cabinet would be pointless and disruptive to the archives and would make a terrible mess.
read: You open the 'Confidential Files' drawer of the file cabinet and find an array of documents neatly arranged inside. Among them, you spot files containing the CEO's [confidential information].
